casebody.data:
Pelc, Appellant, v. Hartford Fire Insurance Company, Appellee.

[Cite as Pele v. Hartford Fire Ins. Co., 104 Ohio St.3d 639, 2005-Ohio-183.]

(No. 2004-1314 Submitted January 11, 2005 Decided February 2, 2005.) Perantinides & Nolan Co., L.P.A., and Chris T. Nolan; Samuel J. Ferruccio Jr., for appellant. Davis & Young and Ann Marie O’Brien, for appellee.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of Hopkins v. Dyer, 104 Ohio St.3d 461, 2004-Ohio-6769, 820 N.E.2d 329.

Moyer, C.J., Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor and O’Donnell, JJ., concur. Resnick and Pfeifer, JJ., dissent. Lanzinger, J., not participating.
